name: U.S. DEPUTY SHERIFF'S ASSOCIATION
description: Non-profit organization that provides training and support to law enforcement agencies.
sampleDescriptions:
Outreach to House and Senate staff to brief them on the innovative law enforcement training being done around the country.

Outreach to House and Senate offices to brief them on the work that USDSA is doing in Kansas and around the country to provide state-of-the-art training to law enforcement agencies.
